post:
Hi All,

We thought you might be a little bored of $10 Atom's in the UK (but they're still available)!

We're currently going through a period of strong growth and have added another US Location to our offering - Asheville, North Carolina.

We've got 30 E3-1230 Servers ready to deploy and have a special price on these just for you LET Readers :)

E3-1230 V2 (Or better)

16GB DDR3 RAM

2X1TB SATA HD

100Mbps Dedicated Unmetered

5 IPv4 IP Addresses

Dedicated IPMI

**This is a new location for us and we want them occupied. Get yours for ONLY $49/month!**

[Click Here - Order Now!](http://www.vortexnode.com/clients/link.php?id=5)

**Use Coupon: LETANC100**

All servers bought from VortexNode.com are unmanaged but include 24x7x365 Support with <30 min average ticket response times.

Got questions? Get in touch. You can reach us by e-mail, tickets, live chat or on the phone.

Test IP's available on request.
